resume.description: Color theme tokens at lightness of 5%, saturation of 90%

Background.description: UI background color. All color contrasts evaluated and generated against this color.

action100.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.2:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action200.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.68:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action300.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 2.52:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action400.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 3.8:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action500.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 5.61:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action600.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 8.13:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)

action700.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 11.41:1 against background hsl(235deg, 83%, 12%)
